title: FTX Creditors Could See $9 Billion Dispersement by Next June
description: Chief restructuring officer John J. Ray III celebrated the milestone, calling FTX's collapse "the most challenging financial disaster" he has seen.

title: Binance US Says Crypto Deposits Are No Longer FDIC Insured
description: The updated terms of service for Binance US indicate that users must first convert their dollars to stablecoins or crypto before withdrawing.

title: ESMA warns no retail crypto protection in EU until 2024 at the earliest – report
description:
The European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA), the bloc’s securities watchdog, warned that investors will not be protected under the European Union’s crypto asset market rules until the end of 2024 at the earliest. According to a statement issued by the ESMA on Tuesday, as reported by Reuters, investors were advised to brace themselves for […]

The post ESMA warns no retail crypto protection in EU until 2024 at the earliest – report appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: For the first time in two years, GBTC discount to NAV drops below 15%
description:
Quick Take The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) fund ended the day yesterday, Oct. 16, up 7.7%. The substantial rise took GBTC’s year-to-date gains to a striking 166%. However, concurrently, the discount to Net Asset Value (NAV) has declined below 15% for the first time in the past two years, now standing at 14.77%, according to […]

The post For the first time in two years, GBTC discount to NAV drops below 15% appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: FTX customers on edge as $9B payout plan awaits approval
description: In a breakthrough for creditors and customers of the bankrupt cryptocurrency exchanges FTX and FTX.US, a proposed settlement has been reached, offering a ray of hope for the return of their assets. title: Xsolla integrates XRP, boosting crypto in gaming
description: BitPay, a renowned cryptocurrency payment provider, has unveiled its latest integration, allowing gamers to use XRP on Xsolla. This update marks another step towards the widespread adoption of digital currencies in the gaming sector. Xsolla, a global gaming platform established in 2005, has been at the forefront of providing innovative solutions to developers, enabling them ... Read more

title: Bitget announces plans to launch high-limit credit card to bolster global crypto payments
description: Bitget, a top-tier cryptocurrency derivative and copy trading platform, has announced plans to launch the Bitget Card. During the Future Blockchain Summit in Dubai Harbour, which runs from October 15 to October 18, the platform revealed that the Bitget Card will be a high-limit, USD-denominated Visa credit card to bolster crypto payment solutions on a ... title: Pennsylvania reverses crypto mining permit ban amid union pressure
description: Pennsylvania’s proposed cryptocurrency mining ban has been removed from a bill aimed at regulating the industry’s energy consumption. The move came after intense pressure from trade labor unions and concerns about the impact on Democratic Party support. Instead of the ban, the bill now imposes ongoing reporting requirements on crypto miners operating in the state. ... Read more

title: Why is the crypto market down today? Bitcoin hovers around $28k
description: Currently, the crypto market is on a bearish trend despite the CPI Data. However, cryptocurrencies are well-known for having an extremely volatile market and are highly susceptible to sudden price movements. The recent rollercoaster ride Bitcoin has experienced has confirmed this attribute about digital currencies.  BTC is trading just above the $28,000 to $28,500 mark ... Read more

title: SEC might cite market manipulation to deny further Bitcoin ETFs

title: Uniswap to charge 0.15% swap fees in web app and wallet
description: Uniswap founder Adam Hayden says the interface fee will allow the team to continue to research, develop and build crypto and defi. One of the largest decentralized exchanges (DEX) has become the latest protocol to charge users fees for using…

title: Binance.US Halts USD Withdrawals, No Longer Holds USD: New ToS
description:
Earlier today, crypto trader Asher Hopp tweeted that Binance.US has upgraded its Terms of Services (ToS). The updated language is likely to alarm some users: Binance.US announced that it no longer holds USD, users who previously deposited USD can no longer withdraw it, and there is no longer any FDIC insurance.
